title: 800 Max Particles and 4 Purified Gems
description: A reward for helping Pokémon GO’s YouTube channel gain 8,000 subscribers.

title: FENDI x FRGMT x POKÉMON Hoodie Avatar Item
description: Trainers can redeem this code to get an exclusive FENDI x FRGMT x POKÉMON hoodie avatar item. (This code should have expired on January 4, 2025 but it appears to still work.)

rewards.name: FENDI x FRGMT x POKÉMON hoodie
